name: Kampus Tri Cakra Flight Academy
about: Kampus Tri Cakra Flight Academy is a premier flight training institution dedicated to producing highly skilled and safety-conscious pilots. With a strong emphasis on professionalism and responsibility, our academy provides comprehensive training programs that adhere to the highest FAA and international aviation standards. Our experienced and certified instructors, state-of-the-art training facilities, and modern fleet ensure students receive the best possible education. We prioritize individualized training, flexible scheduling, and continuous support to help students achieve their aviation goals. Our mission is to create confident, proficient pilots ready for successful careers in aviation, while maintaining a safe and enjoyable learning environment. Join us to embark on a journey that combines technical excellence with the thrill of flight.
services:
["AVIATION SECURITY (AVSEC / BASIC & JUNIOR)
Flight Staff (Ground Staff)
Dangerous Goods (DG)
Flight Attendant
FLIGHT CARGO STAFF
HOTEL STAFF"]
